name: Meow Escape
description:
FOLLOW THE BEAT:

Gravity change  => Kick
Dash => Snare

And press "R" to reset

"Meow Escape" is a simple platformer where the player tries to free his cute animal from a crumbling space station. You have to use Artificial Gravity in order to save them.

Note: This game was made for the Mini Jam 107 with a theme of "Music" and a special limitation, "Gravity is Under Your Control". 
All assets were created by us.

Instructions:

  • "A" or "Q" or "LeftArrow"  to change Gravity
  • "E" or "D" or "RightArrow"  to Dash
  • "R" to restart the level

Technologies:

  • Unity
  • C#
  • Aseprite
  • Clip Studio Paint
  • Reason

We hope you enjoy our game
